revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: Private Memoirs Relative to the Last Year of the Reign of Lewis the Sixteenth, Late King of France. By Ant. Fr. Bertrand de Moleville, Minister of State at that Ti..."
revision.text: Possibly: Private Memoirs Relative to the Last Year of the Reign of Lewis the Sixteenth, Late King of France. By Ant. Fr. Bertrand de Moleville, Minister of State at that Time. Trnslated from the Original Manuscript of the Author, which has never been published. With five portraits, from original pictures, of the royal family of France. In three volumes. (London : Printed for A. Strahan; and T. Cadell jun. and W. Davies (Successors to Mr. Cadell) in the Strand, 1797). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2435715~S1
